column5: SSTI Momentum has definitely stalled here Trying to get a handle on why and to then put share price in context Im wary that we may see a product price cut soon The Nashville loss and others may be a tacit indication that the cost of flex is out of sync with what communities can afford Thats my thesis anyway On the sidelines until sales execution becomes more robust

SSTI The question and answer portion of this is worth a listen Some more focused questions than on earnings call Also notable that SSTI is looking to 1 Colombia and 2 Mexico for Latin America expansion irshotspottercomircalen
